content.question: A long thin wire is connected across the terminals of a battery, and a current <math alttext="I sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> passes through it. The wire is then replaced by another wire that is made of the same material, but is twice the length and half the radius of the original wire. The current that will pass through the new wire is

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction I sub 0 over 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>/</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction I sub 0 over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>/</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction I sub 0 over 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>/</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
